weeklyReports.summary: Project initialized with NestJS. Basic Telegram bot functionality implemented with command handlers for /start, /help, /income, /expense, /upi, and /summary. Income and expense tracking functionality implemented with MongoDB integration. User management and settings functionality implemented. UPI transaction tracking functionality implemented with merchant category detection.
